Function# MACaptionAppearanceCopyActiveProfileID()

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
func MACaptionAppearanceCopyActiveProfileID() -> CFString
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/mediaaccessibility/macaptionappearancecopyactiveprofileid()#return-value)

The currently-selected profileID.

## [Discussion](/documentation/mediaaccessibility/macaptionappearancecopyactiveprofileid()#discussion)

Gets the currently-selected caption drawing profileID system wide.
